title: A novel integrated industrial approach with cobots in the age of industry 4.0 through conversational interaction and computer vision
abstract: arXiv:2402.10553v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: From robots that replace workers to robots that serve as helpful colleagues, the field of robotic automation is experiencing a new trend that represents a huge challenge for component manufacturers. The contribution starts from an innovative vision that sees an ever closer collaboration between Cobot, able to do a specific physical job with precision, the AI world, able to analyze information and support the decision-making process, and the man able to have a strategic vision of the future.

translated_title: 工业4.0时代中具有对话交互和计算机视觉的新型集成工业方法与合作机器人
translated_abstract: 从取代工人的机器人到作为有益同事的机器人，机器人自动化领域正在经历一种新的趋势，这对零部件制造商来说是一个巨大挑战。该论文贡献了一个创新愿景，看到协作机器人（Cobot）与人工智能世界以及人类之间愈发紧密的合作，Cobot能够精确执行特定的体力工作，人工智能能够分析信息并支持决策过程，而人类能够对未来有战略性的愿景。
tldr: 论文提出一种创新愿景，认为在工业4.0时代，协作机器人（Cobot）、人工智能和人类之间将会有更紧密的协作，有助于提高工业自动化的效率和决策制定。
en_tdlr: The paper presents an innovative vision that in the age of Industry 4.0, there will be a closer collaboration between cobots, artificial intelligence, and humans, leading to improved efficiency and decision-making in industrial automation.
